channel.title: Politics on Jesús Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in Politics on Jesús Pérez

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 20
item.description: This week is a short one, I don’t have much to say and also spent most of the week without internet (third world’s nice AMIRITE). [podcast] #620: How to Deal With Life’s Regrets A podcast discussing the concept of counterfactual thinking, what it is, how it affects our lives and some other things related to it. [blog-post] Politics matters most to slaves. In this post Luke Smith explains why he usually doesn’t talk about politics in his youtube channel or in his website.
